game.name: Neon Runner
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Neon Runner is a fast paced runner style game that requires speed and precision to complete all levels as quickly as possible and set a high score.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Neon Runner is a fast paced runner style game that requires speed and precision to complete all levels as quickly as possible and set a high score.
